alert.note: Alert for Gillespie; Kendall; Kerr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 9:03PM CDT until September 24 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Kerr County in south central Texas... Southwestern Gillespie County in south central Texas... Northwestern Kendall County in south central Texas... * Until 1000 PM CDT. * At 903 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Tivydale, or 10 miles southwest of Fredericksburg, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kerrville, Fredericksburg, Comfort, Camp Verde, Kerrville-Schreiner Park, Old Tunnel State Park, Bankersmith, Sisterdale, Cypress Creek, Center Point, Waring, Grapetown, and Crown. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
